name: @fidanjs/runtime
description: High performance and easy way for building web user interfaces.

scripts.build-browser: microbundle src/index-browser.ts --format iife --name fidan --output build/fidan.js --sourcemap false --no-compress
scripts.build-browser-min: microbundle src/index-browser.ts --format iife --name fidan --output build/fidan.min.js --sourcemap false
scripts.local: yarn build && yarn build-browser && yarn build-browser-min && yalc publish && yalc push
